.help
console.log("Balance (MATIC):", ethers.utils.formatEther(bal));
const bal = await ethers.provider.getBalance(await signer.getAddress());
const [signer] = await ethers.getSigners();
const console.log("Balance (MATIC):", ethers.utils.formatEther(bal));
const [signer] = await ethers.getSigners();
